import React from 'react' import { db } from '../firebase.js' import { doc, setDoc } from "firebase/firestore" export default function AdminAddMenu() { const Submit = async(event) => { event.preventDefault() const itemName = event.target[0].value; const price = event.target[1].value; console.log("Updated") await setDoc(doc(db, "Menu", "HomeMenu"), { Name: itemName, Price: price }); console.log("Updated") } return (
) }
